SEARCH
Package entities

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
entities.User
entities.Manager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class Manager extends User
Represents a Manager who is responsible for managing projects, approving or rejecting applications, and handling enquiries in the system.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Manager

      public Manager(String name, String nric, int age, String maritalStatus, String password, boolean isVisible, AuthenticationController ac, Role role)
      Constructs a Manager object with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Manager.
      nric - The NRIC of the Manager.
      age - The age of the Manager.
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the Manager.
      password - The password for the Manager.
      isVisible - The visibility status of the Manager.
      ac - The AuthenticationController instance for authentication.
      role - The role of the Manager.

    • viewAllEnquiries

      public void viewAllEnquiries(EnquiryController enquiryController, int choice)
      Displays all enquiries for projects based on the provided choice. If choice is 1, shows all enquiries. If the choice is anything else, it filters the enquiries by the Manager's assigned project.
      Parameters:
      enquiryController - The controller responsible for handling enquiries.
      choice - The filter choice: 1 for all enquiries, other values for manager-specific enquiries.

    • replyToEnquiry

      public void replyToEnquiry(Scanner sc, EnquiryController enquiryController)
      Allows the Manager to reply to an enquiry. The Manager is prompted to enter the Enquiry ID and their reply. If the enquiry belongs to the Manager's project, the reply is saved. The enquiry is then updated in the EnquiryDatabase.
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object for user input.
      enquiryController - The controller responsible for handling enquiries.
